answers.author: Derek Johnson
answers.text:
Gretchen,
If you're looking for information on best practices related to finance and budgeting, ICMA has several topic pages that may be good places to start:
Finance and Budgeting Topic Page: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/98/Finance_and_Budgeting
Financial Management: http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/99/Financial_Management
Each topic page has articles, reports, studies and other documents related to best practices. 
Furthermore, the right hand side of each topic page lists self identified expert in these areas on the Knowledge Network. It would probably be worth your time to try and reach out to some of them if you have specific questions. They may have relevant documents not found on the Knowledge Network. 
If you're looking for something more specific let me know and I will try to track it down for you. Good luck.
Derek Johnson
